name: Colorblind Bob
description:
What is this ?

This is a platformer game in active development (I will continue to work on it after the jam has ended) where your goal is to survive the levels while collecting all the snowflakes. Don't get crushed by the blocs ! Have fun !

Controls:

W/A/S/D to move

SPACE to jump

Hint: 
  • To enter a new level, your screen must be full black (not counting snowflakes obviously)
  • Have a go with the shop... It might be useful.
Misc:

This game was made for the  Black and White Jam #⁷√∞ using the Olc:PixelGameEngine.

Thanks to my friend Simmanz for upgrading my graphics !
